Journal of Computational and Applied Mathematics, 62:27-40, 1995.<P> A. Hadjidimos, D. Noutsos, and M. Tzoumas. Exact SOR Convergence Regions for a General Class of p-Cyclic Matrices. BIT, 35:469-487, 1995.<P> S. B. Kim, E. N. Houstis, A. Hadjidimos, and J. R. Rice. The Performance of Parallel Stationary Iterative Methods for Distributed Memory Machines. In D. Marinescu and R. Frost, editors, Proceedings of the Intel Supercomputer Users' Group, pages 169-173, 1994.<P> Y.-L. Lai, A. Hadjidimos, E. N. Houstis, and J. R. Rice. General Interior Hermite Collocation Methods for Second Order Elliptic Partial Differential Equations. Applied Numerical Mathematics, 16:183-200, 1994.<P> Y.-L. Lai, A. Hadjidimos, E. N. Houstis, and J. R. Rice. On the Iterative Solution of Hermite Collocation Equations.
